name: Turnstone Global

address: Suite -F1, Om Tower, 36C, B.T. Road, Kolkata - 700002.

briefDescription: Turnstone Global(formerly National Association for the Blind - West Bengal) is one of the oldest NGO serving the underprivileged for more than six decades,formed to serve persons with disability to make them self-reliant. Thereafter, our scale of operations expanded to several other sectors of social, economic and environmental development, enabling us to touch lives of more than six lakhs beneficiaries so forth.Our experience in education, skill development, training management, rehabilitation, human & child rights, women empowerment, care for the aged and blind, agriculture and environmental sustainability etc. has earned benevolent support from renowned corporate houses and PSUs, like Cognizant, HDFC, Amway, Dabur, Spencers Retail, Bharti Foundation, PBSSM & Swach Bharat Mission, Give India, NASSCOM & many others.Turnstone Global, an ISO 9001: 2008 certified organization, plans to enhance our capacity in the said field & bring a sea-change in the society.
